question: How many Rijksmonumenten (national heritage sites) are there in Leeuwarden, Netherlands?
asked_question_translated: Hvor mange Rijksmonumenten (nasjonale kulturminner) finnes det i Leeuwarden, Nederland?
answer: Det finnes over 800 Rijksmonumenten i Leeuwarden, Nederland.
answer_translated_eng: Det finnes over 800 Rijksmonumenten i Leeuwarden, Netherlands.
